entry.title: Hello world!
entry.summary: This is more of a test post, I'm trying to see if I can pull off a simple blog for general long-winded musings and thoughts, would be a better deal than trying to use TwitLonger, haha. Anyway! We shall see how well it works out.
entry.content:
This is more of a test post, I'm trying to see if I can pull off a simple blog for general long-winded musings and thoughts, would be a better deal than trying to use TwitLonger, haha.

Anyway! We shall see how well it works out.
